response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, I estimate its true worth to be $12,000. Considering its immense value to you, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This represents an outstanding opportunity to acquire a product that exceeds your expectations without a significant financial burden. I look forward to your consideration of this offer.", "product_price": 9500}
